org.hornetq.jms.client
Class HornetQTextMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.hornetq.jms.client.HornetQMessage
      org.hornetq.jms.client.HornetQTextMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.jms.Message, javax.jms.TextMessage
public class HornetQTextMessage
extends HornetQMessage
implements javax.jms.TextMessage

HornetQ implementation of a JMS TextMessage.
This class was ported from SpyTextMessage in JBossMQ.

Version:
$Revision: 3412 $ $Id: HornetQRATextMessage.java 3412 2007-12-05 19:41:47Z timfox $
Author:
Norbert Lataille (Norbert.Lataille@m4x.org), Jason Dillon, Adrian Brock, Tim Fox, Ovidiu Feodorov, Andy Taylor
